import React,{ useState,useEffect } from 'react' import axios from 'axios'; import CustomLoader from '../custom_loader' export default function Dashboard() { const [menusData, setMenusData] = useState([]); const [userData, setUserData] = useState({}); const [newMenuData, setNewMenuData] = useState({name:"",description:""}); const [laodingStatus,setlaodingStatus] = useState(false) useEffect(() => { setlaodingStatus(true) axios.get(`menu`) .then(res => { setMenusData(res.data) setlaodingStatus(false) }).catch(error => { setlaodingStatus(false) alert(error.message) }) axios.get(`user`) .then(res => { setUserData(res.data) }).catch(error => { alert(error.message) }) }, []) return (

  • {userData.name}




{setNewMenuData({...newMenuData,"name":e.currentTarget.value})}} class="form-control" placeholder="Name" />
